name: append
javadoc:
/**
 * Appends a new {@link KeepCommand} to the list of commands.
 *
 * @param command The command to be appended.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Appends a new {@link KeepCommand} to the list of commands, incrementing the length of the LCS.
 *
 * @param command The command to be appended. It must not be null.
 */

name: getLCSLength
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns the length of the longest common subsequence (LCS) between two sequences.
 *
 * @return The length of the LCS.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns the length of the longest common subsequence (LCS) between two sequences.
 *
 * @return The length of the LCS, where 0 indicates that no common subsequence exists.
 */

name: getModifications
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns the number of modifications.
 *
 * @return The total number of modifications.
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Retrieves the total count of modifications made to the system or data.
 *
 * @return The cumulative number of modifications, indicating the extent of changes made.
 */

name: visit
javadoc:
/**
 * Visits each command in this collection using the given visitor.
 *
 * @param visitor the visitor to use when visiting each command
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Visits each command in this collection using the given visitor.
 *
 * @param visitor the visitor to use when visiting each command
 */
